name: DIE! (Conkeron)
description:
Do you enjoy mass genocide ;D?
Me too!
Enjoy endless slaughter of little dice utilizing the most powerful guns in existence!

DIE! Is a level based wave shooter game with the goal of obtaining the most points while going through the game unlocking new weapons.

You have 6 lives, your life counter is shown on the player sprite corresponding to the orientation of the dice, e.g. dice on the 4 face means 4 lives left.

New guns are unlocked every 600 points with up to 6 guns including the AK-47 that you start with = 3000 points to unlock every weapon.

Every 1000 points you unlock a potential gun slot for every new round. For example, if you have 5000 points you have a random chance to end up with 5 guns for the next round, this scales up to 6 guns.
